db:abstract.db:para: Provides information about existing serial ports.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Use the static functions to generate a list of QSerialPortInfo objects. Each QSerialPortInfo object in the list represents a single serial port and can be queried for the port name, system location, description, and manufacturer. The QSerialPortInfo class can also be used as an input parameter for the setPort() method of the QSerialPort class.

db:section.db:title: QSerialPortInfo::QSerialPortInfo()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty QSerialPortInfo object.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QSerialPortInfo::QSerialPortInfo(const QSerialPort &port)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QSerialPortInfo object from serial port.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QSerialPortInfo::QSerialPortInfo(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QSerialPortInfo object from serial port name.
This constructor finds the relevant serial port among the available ones according to the port name name, and constructs the serial port info instance for that port.

db:section.db:title: QSerialPortInfo::QSerialPortInfo(const QSerialPortInfo &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QSerialPortInfo::~QSerialPortInfo()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the QSerialPortInfo object. References to the values in the object become invalid.

db:section.db:title: [static] QList<QSerialPortInfo> QSerialPortInfo::availablePorts()
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of available serial ports on the system.

db:section.db:title: QString QSerialPortInfo::description() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the description string of the serial port, if available; otherwise returns an empty string.

db:section.db:title: bool QSerialPortInfo::hasProductIdentifier() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if there is a valid 16-bit product number present; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QSerialPortInfo::hasVendorIdentifier() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if there is a valid 16-bit vendor number present; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QSerialPortInfo::isBusy() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if serial port is busy; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QSerialPortInfo::isNull() const
db:section.db:para: Returns whether this QSerialPortInfo object holds a serial port definition.

db:section.db:title: QString QSerialPortInfo::manufacturer() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the manufacturer string of the serial port, if available; otherwise returns an empty string.

db:section.db:title: QString QSerialPortInfo::portName() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the serial port.

db:section.db:title: quint16 QSerialPortInfo::productIdentifier() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the 16-bit product number for the serial port, if available; otherwise returns zero.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.3] QString QSerialPortInfo::serialNumber() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the serial number string of the serial port, if available; otherwise returns an empty string.

db:note.db:para: The serial number may include letters.

db:section.db:para: This function was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: [static] QList<qint32> QSerialPortInfo::standardBaudRates()
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of available standard baud rates supported by the target platform.

db:section.db:title: void QSerialPortInfo::swap(QSerialPortInfo &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps QSerialPortInfo other with this QSerialPortInfo. This operation is very fast and never fails.

db:section.db:title: QString QSerialPortInfo::systemLocation() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the system location of the serial port.

db:section.db:title: quint16 QSerialPortInfo::vendorIdentifier() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the 16-bit vendor number for the serial port, if available; otherwise returns zero.

db:section.db:title: QSerialPortInfo &QSerialPortInfo::operator=(const QSerialPortInfo &other)
db:section.db:para: Sets the QSerialPortInfo object to be equal to other.

db:section.db:title: Obsolete Members for QSerialPortInfo
db:section.db:para: The following members of class QSerialPortInfo are deprecated. We strongly advise against using them in new code.

db:section.db:title: [deprecated] bool QSerialPortInfo::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: This function is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.
Returns true if serial port is present on system; otherwise returns false.
